name: CthuCthu's Bizarre Adventure (Coldsolarknight233, Boxx, Archy_R6, RuthlessNutx, Penguinnnn)
name_original: CthuCthu's Bizarre Adventure (Coldsolarknight233, Boxx, Archy_R6, RuthlessNutx, Penguinnnn)
description:
Game Background

CthuCthu's Bizarre Adventure is a third-person octopus runner game. CthuCthu is one of the most powerful ancient gods in the world. It lost its strength and was caught by scientists in the laboratory for experiments. One day it broke the container and escaped from the laboratory. Escape from it... 

Players can stick to the wall by stretching out CthuCthu's eight tentacles to move, avoiding the laboratory's lasers during the movement. 

In the end, It found its original power and became the root of the universe.

How to Play

1. Q/W/E/A/D/Z/X/C to extend the legs. If the leg reaches objects, the player will be dragged in the direction of the leg.

2. Mouse can adjust the camera angle. However, the player facing will not change.

3. Press T to back to save point (where you collected the octopus power)

4. Press B to open/close the play guide

5. Max hp 2

6. Recover 1 hp every 5 seconds

7. Yellow laser: 1 damage

8. Red laser: 2 damage

Team

Shuhuai Li: Game Design

Ding Yuan: Game Design, TA & UI 

Shuangyang Ren: Character Design & Story Illustration

Qirong Yin: Scene Art & Icon Illustration

Ziyin He: Gameplay Programming
